lastfm.description: The Last.fm API allows anyone to build their own programs using Last.fm data, whether they're on the web, the desktop or mobile devices.
lastfm.name: Last.fm

webaudio.description: The Web Audio API provides a powerful and versatile system for controlling audio on the Web, allowing developers to choose audio sources, add effects to audio, create audio visualizations, apply spatial effects (such as panning) and much more.
webaudio.name: Web Audio

soundcloud.description: Using the SoundCloud API, you can build applications that take sound on the web to the next level. With this guide we explain and provide code examples for many common integration use cases like playing and uploading sounds or how to take advantage of SoundCloud's many social features.
soundcloud.name: SoundCloud

clyp.description: The Clyp API is a JSON based RESTful API that powers clyp.it directly via CORS, as well as our mobile apps. Using Clyp's API, you can do everything that's available on clyp.it.
clyp.name: clyp
